story:
At the time a portrait was drawn of a 
young man, he had short brown hair and 
no facial hair. Now the man's hair is 
long and gray and so is his beard.
question:
Today the length of the man's hair 
is long.

False or True?

story:
A large oak tree stood in front of City 
Hall from the time the building was built.  
Last year the tree fell down and was replaced 
by a stone fountain.
question:
An antique drawing of City Hall 
shows a fountain in front.

False or True?
